trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around July 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswe as a family had decided to take a day trip upto london for the day and thought going past buckingham palace was a good idea t around 9am as my partner has never actually been there just before arriving at the palace we watched some of the queens horses ride past and took some photos then slowly drove past the palace and saw a stange brigthness in the sky and was very confused so we took a picture and then it had dissappered,when returning home i put the picture on the computer and zoomed in to get a clearer view and was amazed at what we saw. it had a circle movement on the outer ring then a fixed inner circle.
Summary: touring london and took pictures and this appeared so we took the photo
